Detailed Description

Class for one ultrasonic range sensor.

Use rosparam range_sensor_driver/topics to specify unique topic names otherwhise each sensor publishes on /ultrasound_#.

Constructor to initialize publishers and messages.

Initializes limitations on the ultrasonic sensor such as max, min ranges view-angle.
